Luis tiene una tienda la cual atiende junto a su esposa, además realiza trabajos de estructuras metálicas y elaboración de productos artesanales, en ocasiones él sale a vender a pueblos vecinos en los días de comercio, es así como Luis se gana la vida aunque cada vez es más difícil por su edad pero eso no lo detiene para seguir luchando por salir adelante.

 El  crédito lo necesita para comprar más productos para surtir su tienda ya que se acerca la época navideña y la demanda será más alta.

Él sueña con seguir trabajando con esta institución pues le ha ayudado hasta el momento a prosperar en sus actividades productivas y generar ingresos económicos para su hogar.
texts.en:
Luis is 64 years old and is married. His wife works taking care of the household chores. They have one child. Luis has a store that he and his wife both work in. He also does metalwork and creates artesian products and sometimes goes to neighboring towns to sell his products. This is how Luis earns an income although, it is starting to become more difficult because of his age. But, that does not keep him from continuing to fight to get ahead.

He needs a loan to buy more products to stock his store as the Christmas season is approaching and the demand will be greater. He dreams of continuing to work with this institution as they have helped him succeed in his economic activities and generate an income for his family.

loans.use: to buy more products to stock his store for the increased demand of the Christmas season.

loans.name: Sandy Johanna

texts.es:
Sandy, de 23 años de edad, es una joven visionaria, está soltera y vive junto a su madre, su padrastro y un hermano menor. 

Sandy, desde que tenía 4 años de edad, aprendió a trabajar vendiendo frutas, verduras y ropa junto a su madre.- Actualmente, está trabajando en un comedor ubicado en la primera planta de un Hospital en el centro de la ciudad, este negocio solo funciona mientras duren las fiestas patronales.

Sandy, necesita el préstamo para comprar verduras, condimentos, cacerolas e insumos para la comida en las noches, donde haya alguna festividad, porque actualmente la ciudad está celebrando las fiestas patronales durante todo el mes y cada noche se realiza una fiesta.

Sandy, sueña con llegar a tener una tienda de ropa en el centro de la ciudad y que esto le permita gozar de una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sandy is 23 years old. She a creative young woman, she is single and lives with her mother, her stepfather and a younger brother.

Sandy started working when she was 4, selling fruits, vegetable and clothes together with her mother. She currently works in a restaurant located on the first floor of a hospital in the city center. This restaurant is open only during the patron saint holidays.

Sandy is requesting a loan to buy vegetables, condiments, pans, and supplies in order to make and sell food during local holiday nights. The town is currently celebrating the patron saint holidays for the entire month, and there is a celebration every night.

Sandy dreams of succeeding in running a clothes shop in the city center, and that this will help her achieving a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, condiments, pans, and supplies for her food business

loans.name: Elba Isabel

texts.es:
Elba, de 49 años de edad, está casada, su esposo trabaja en la agricultura y tiene una hija que se dedica al comercio de cerdos.

Elba, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 10 años, específicamente cultiva maíz, frijol y café, todo lo aprendió de su madre, quien toda su vida se dedicó a la agricultura, ella viaja a pie y camina treinta minutos para llegar a su trabajo, pero también tiene un molino en su casa para generar ingresos extras para cubrir las necesidades de su familia.

Elba, necesita el préstamo para comprar ganado y para comprar fertilizantes.

Elba, sueña con tener una pequeña ganadería y elaborar lácteos para vender en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Elba is 49 years old and married, her husband works in agriculture and she has a daughter who woks in the pig trade.

Elba has worked in agriculture for the past 10 years, specifically growing corn, beans, and coffee, all of which she learned from her mother, who worked in agriculture her whole life. She travels by foot and walks 30 minutes to work. 

She also has a mill in her home to help make some extra money and cover the needs of her family.

Elba needs the loan to buy cattle and fertilizer. She dreams of having a small cattle breeding business and to produce dairy to sell in her community.

loans.use: To buy cattle and fertilizer

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es: Manuel de 54 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, el se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos desde hace 10 años, comercializa los pollos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside y posee muchos clientes, gracias a su trabajo y a las ganancias que obtiene es como ha podido salir adelante con los gastos de su hogar, el cliente esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas pollos por mayor para continuar con la crianza y asi poder tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Manuel is 54 years old, he lives in his own house with his life partner, and he has been engaging in breeding and selling chickens for 10 years. He sells chickens around the area where he lives and has many clients who are thankful for his work. The extra income is a way for him to get ahead with paying his household expenses

He is requesting a loan to buy more chickens at wholesale price to continue breeding them, thus increasing his income.

loans.use: buy more chickens at wholesale price.

loans.name: José Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro, de 42 años de edad, actualmente está casado y tiene una hija, expresa que tiene su su propio taller donde hace su labor diaria de carpintería.

Pedro, ya tiene 29 años de trabajar  en el oficio de la carpintería, lo cual esto le ha permitido que sea muy conocido por muchas personas, ya que su trabajo es muy delicado y con un buen gusto es decir es entregado en su trabajo y se esmera cada día mas para así satisfacer a sus clientes y que estos le puedan recomendar mas personas.

Él necesita el crédito para comprar una vaca ya que tiene un predio donde la puede mantener para darle el cuido necesario y espera venderla a futuro a buen precio.

Su sueño es continuar trabajando en la carpintería y siempre brindarles apoyo económico a sus hijos para que continúen sus estudios.
texts.en:
Pedro is 42 years old, is married, and has a daughter. He comments that he has his own workshop where he does his daily carpentry work.

Pedro has already worked for 29 years as a carpenter, which has allowed him to be very well known by many people, since his work is very delicate and is done with good taste. That is to say, he is very committed to his work and goes to more and more effort every day to thus satisfy his customers and have them recommend him to more people.

He needs the loan to buy a cow, since he has a piece of land where he can maintain it to give it the necessary care, and he hopes to sell it in the future at a good price.

Su sueño es continuar trabajando en la carpintería y siempre brindarles apoyo económico a sus hijos para que continúen sus estudios.

His dream is to continue working in carpentry and to always offer economic support to his daughter so that she can continue with their studies.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is married and a mother of two children. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in the year 2014 and has benefited from the training especially on enterprise development and financial management.
She does vegetable and tomato farming alongside goat rearing. She is taking a Kiva loan to buy more seedlings and pesticide to ensure better yield thus increased income. She intends to use the anticipated profits in paying school fees and providing food to her children.

She thanks Kiva and their lenders for the help and support and promise to repay well.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and pesticides hence more yields and increased income to pay education fees for  her children and provide better food

loans.name: Adolat

texts.ru:
Адолат жизнерадостная женщина 57 лет. Она вдова и имеет двоих детей. Адолат со своими детьми живёт в сельской местности. Она очень трудолюбивый и хороший человек. Адолат старается всегда поддерживать чистоту и порядок  в своем доме. 
У Адолат есть крупно рогатый скот, за которым она ежедневно ухаживает. Она животных покупает на базаре, потом откармливает их и перепродает. Так Адолат зарабатывает на жизнь. А ее дети помогают ей в этом. Полученное молоко они продают своим соседям.  Вот уже 2 года Адолат занимается этим делом, от этого дела она получает хороший стабильный доход.
В данный момент Адолат хочет купить еще крупно рогатый скот, чтоб еще больше производила молока на продажу.  Для этого ей нужны денежные средства. Поэтому Адолат обратилась в Арванд, для получения кредит для осуществления своих планов.
Она заранее благодарить «Арванд» за предоставленную ей помощь и надеется положительный результат.
texts.en:
Adolat is a 57-year-old widow with two children and a positive attitude towards life.  She lives with her family in a rural area.  She is a very hardworking and kind person who always tries to maintain cleanliness and order in her house.

Adolat has some cattle and she takes care of her animals every day.  She buys cows at the market, fattens them up and then resells them.  This is how she makes a living.  Her children help her with her work and resell milk to the neighbors.  Adolat has been involved in this farming activity for the past two years and she makes a stable income from it.

At the moment, Adolat would like to buy an additional cow and sell larger volumes of milk.  However, she doesn't have enough money for this purchase, so she has turned to MDO Arvand to request a loan and achieve her goals.  She thanks Arvand in advance for their help and she looks forward to a positive outcome.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: Isabel es un hombre trabajador que vive con su esposa en casa de su propiedad desde hace 25 años. Él se dedica a prestar sus servicios de ayudante en una empresa recicladora, lo que le permite sacar adelante a su familia, desde hace 11 años. Isabel ha mejorado su vivienda poco a poco con el crédito anterior construyo una galera en su vivienda, ya que en época de lluvia el agua ingresaba a la misma deteriorando sus pertenecías, por lo que solicita un nuevo crédito a FUSAI para comprar: cemento, arena, grava y ladrillo para construir el muro de contención en la parte que muestra la fotografía para brindar mayor seguridad a su familia.
texts.en:
Isabel is a hardworking man who has lived with his wife in their own home for the past 25 years. He has worked as an assistant at a recycling company for 11 years, which allows him to provide for his family. Bit by bit, Isabel has improved his home. With a previous loan, he built a barrier wall for his home because during the rainy season water enters the home and damages his belongings.

For this reason, he is requesting a new loan with FUSAI to buy: cement, sand, gravel, and bricks to build a retaining wall in the area shown in the picture, in order to provide better safety for his family.

loans.use: to buy: cement, sand, gravel, a bricks to build a retaining wall in the area shown in the picture.

loans.name: Meruzhan

texts.en:
In the frontier village Getahovit of Tavsuh region lives Meruzhan with his big family. He is married and he has two daughters and a son. He children are already grown up and all of them are employed. Meruzhan many years and till today works at the Ijevan city’s electrical networks as an electrician.

He is at the same time runs his farm and he has cows, calves, a heifer, bulls and chickens. Meruzha’s wife makes very tasty cheese, macun (national dairy-product) and butter for sale. They also organize the sale of milk, meat and eggs from their farm.

Meruzhan mentions that he finds swine breeding very profitable and he has plans of getting specialized in it. This loan he plans to spend on the purchase of several pigs and also fodder for all his farm cattle.

loans.use: purchase several pigs and also fodder for all his farm cattle.

loans.name: Mwanajuma

texts.en:
Mwanajuma is a married woman and a mother of four children who attend school. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. Her goals are to fix an underground water source.

She sells fruits and green vegetables. She always struggles to improve her grocery stall, trying to sell more and save money in order to have a more formal establishment. She also sells water. Mwanajuma is requesting a loan to buy grocery and water for resale.

She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to buy grocery and water for resale.

loans.name: María Rosa

texts.es:
María de 60 años de edad,  estudió hasta segundo grado porque la situación de sus padres no se lo permitían siendo de escasos recursos, se casó y junto a su compañero de vida procreó 3 hijos, lamentablemente su matrimonio no funcionó y tuvo que dedicarse sola a sacar adelante a sus hijos.


A raíz del abandono de su esposo, María se vio en dificultades para mantener a sus hijos, fue entonces que ella decidió poner una tienda la cual le ha servido de mucho porque la ha ido bien y ha permitido que pueda generar ingresos para poder superarse y cubrir sus necesidades.

Ella solicita este crédito para comprar una ternera y alimentarla para venderla después a buen precio y obtener ganancias.


Ella sueña con surtir su tienda para tener mas clientes que busquen de sus productos y de esta manera mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
María, 60 years old, studied until second grade because the situation of her parents would not allow her, them being poor. She got married and with her life partner she had three children. Unfortunately, their marriage didn't work and she had to commit alone in bringing up their children.

Following her husband's abandonment, María was struggling to support her children. It was then that she decided to open a store which has served her greatly because she has done well and has allowed her to generate income to be able to succeed and meet her needs.

María is requesting this loan to buy a heifer and feed it to later sell it at a good price and earn profits. She dreams of stocking her store to have more customers looking for her products and thus improve her financial income.

loans.use: to buy a heifer.

loans.name: María Yolanda

texts.es:
María, de 36 años de edad, está casada y tiene 3 hijos, ellos estudian en la escuela de la comunidad.


María, desde muy pequeña se ha dedicado a los oficios domésticos, pues creció en una familia con mucho trabajo y por eso ella siempre está dispuesta a ganarse el alimento diario.


Ella necesita el crédito para comprar medicamentos para su madre que se encuentra mal de salud.

Su mayor sueño es poder continuar trabajando junto a su esposo para poder sacar adelante a sus hijos y apoyarles con el estudio y que puedan realizarse como personas profesionales para que esto les genere una mejor oportunidad de trabajo.
texts.en:
María is 36 years old, married, and has three children who study at the school in their community. Since she was young, María has done domestic work, since she grew up with a family with a lot of work, and she has always been ready to earn her daily bread.

She is requesting this loan to purchase medicines for her mother, who is in bad health.

Her greatest dream is to be able to continue working together with her husband to help her children succeed and support their education so they can become professionals who have better career opportunities.

loans.use: to purchase medicines for her mother, who is in bad health.

loans.name: Isiyaku

texts.en:
Isiyaku is a maize farmer from kadanya Biyar village. As a Babban Gona member, Isiyaku is excited to have access to a trained agronomist and superior inputs that will give him the chance to achieve high yields of up to 8 Metric Tonnes of Maize per Hectare of Land, 5.5 times higher than the average Nigerian farmer. 
Before joining Babban Gona, Isiyaku would have had to sell his maize at harvest, when the price of maize is at it’s lowest, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. As a Babban Gona member Isiyaku can to store the maize he harvests and delay selling it until a period later on in the season when he can obtain the best price for his maize at a premium of up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.
Thanks to the support from Babban Gona’s marketing services, Isiyaku no longer feels the pressure to sell his maize at low harvest prices. With the opportunity to earn up to $2000 per Hectare of land, Isiyaku hopes to realize better yields and plans on using his additional income to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest

loans.name: Habila

texts.en:
Habila is a maize farmer and Babban Gona member. Anticipating a good harvest this season, Habila has the opportunity to attain yields of up to 8 Metric Tonnes of Maize per Hectare of Land, 5.5 times that of the average Nigerian maize farmer. 
Before joining Babban Gona, Habila would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support Habila can store his maize and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest. 
As a Babban Gona member, Habila will benefit from marketing support that could see him generate earnings of up to $2000 per hectare of land. Habila is thankful that he now has the opportunity to improve the life of his children and family and looks forward to using his additional earnings to ensure that all his children get a post secondary education.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest

loans.name: Chebelo-Pele Group

texts.en:
Mosiuoa is a 58 year old father of 7 children and 4 young grandchildren between 5 and 1 years. His wife died and now lives with his elderly mother in a traditional hut that is not well ventilated, nor warms up well in winter. He lives with 4 of his children and 2 of his grandchildren. Neither of his children work proper jobs hence earn very little.He works long hours in his farm with 1 of his children while the other 2 are employed in other people's farms with the youngest of 14 still going to school during the week and helping in the field on Saturdays and Sundays. 

Together with his youngest child, Mosiuoa had to wake up very early between 4am and 5am during the week, to start preparing the fire for cooking breakfast, heating water and warming the house for his family before going out to attend to daily work because he could not afford any other means. However with little money he makes while working,plus his mother's pension money,which is not much, and the little his other children make;he is now able to afford to buy gas and paraffin both which are very expensive.

He finds himself having to pay about R500 to R600 a month to have sufficient gas,paraffin and groceries which include candles for lighting and charcoal for his traditional home made heater;money he hardly makes. Not only is gas expensive for Mosiuoa and many like him, but it is highly flammable and when inhaled can lead to lung diseases even death. Candles have proven to cause a lot of fire accidents even deaths because they are often forgotten to blown out which is dangerous and the traditional heater is worse in Mosiuoa's family of small children like Mosiuoa's grandchildren. 

Mosiuoa has requested a loan from Kiva lenders, in order to be able to purchase clean cook stoves which provide Mosiuoa and 7 other people from his village, who are living in the similar circumstances, the chance of cooking in a way that does not harm them and their families, and that does not require a lot of wood, which is hard to find in Lesotho, nor expensive paraffin and gas. This stove can be started with the use of very little, readily available biomass like dry twigs and dry cow dung that do not require lengths of time to collect. It does not produce smoke while burning, thus making it safe to be used inside the homes. 

This stove comes with a solar panel for charging the battery which runs the fan in the stove, a USB port for charging phones and a mini LED lamp. A life improving package for these people. This stove saves them time to be with their family, saves energy, eliminates the element of toxic inhalation, house burning and has given them the freedom to have a better lit home to see better in the evening while cooking and enables children to do their homework. For stove info please check www.africancleanenergy.com

loans.use: to be able to pay for the ACE cook stove which will improve his life in terms of health, cost of fuel and the time he spends collecting firewood.

loans.name: Katherine Patricia

texts.es: Katherine es una mujer admirada en su comunidad, por sus deseos de salir adelante, ella vive con su hijo y su sobrino de 5 años de edad. Ella se dedica a la agricultura, cultivando diferentes granos básicos lo que le permite sacar adelante a su familia, con mucho esfuerzo. Katherine desea instalar energía eléctrica en su vivienda, y para ello solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: alambre eléctrico, toma corriente, caja térmica, etc., para instalar energía eléctrica en su vivienda.
texts.en: Katherine is a woman who is admired in her community for her desire to get ahead. She lives with her son and her five-year-old nephew. She works in agriculture, growing different basic grains, which allows her to support her family with great effort. Katherine would like to install electrical power in her home. For this reason she is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy electrical wire, power outlets, and a fuse box, etc., to install electrical power in her home.

loans.use: to buy electrical wire, power outlets, and a fuse box, etc., to install electrical power in her home.

loans.name: Vaqif

texts.en:
Vaqif is 25 years old. He is an IDP. He lives in Bilasuvar region which is a settlement for refugee people. He is newly married. His family is large, because he is taking care of his spouse and also his elderly parents. Vaqif has a good reputation in the local market, where he has a small shop and sells many varied products.

Usually people go to his shop for clothes, home appliances and other basic necessities.. People are in great need for such type of seller. Vaqif's job is more dependent on people giving him as reference to the others. Due to his excellence and his customer satisfaction priority he gets many clients in the town.

Vaqif is a very hard-working and energetic man. He wants to become a successful person and to meet the family needs in a better way. For this he plans to improve his business. He is planning to buy new stock, home appliances, and other goods. He requires 1200 AZN loan. He hopes that Kiva lenders will support him.

loans.use: to buy new stock, including home appliances and other goods.

loans.name: Jorge Ivan

texts.es:
Jorge, a sus 54 años de edad, desea dedicarse a la confección directa; esta idea surge de la necesidad de sentirse útil y productivo, además está pasando por una difícil situación económica. 

El manifiesta que su avanzada edad no le perjudica para realizar las labores manuales, por lo que quiere dar inicio a su propio taller de confección. 

Actualmente solicita un crédito para invertirlo en la compra de una máquina fileteadora e insumos al por mayor (telas, hilos, adornos, botones, entre otros), con lo que podrá poner en marcha su idea de negocio, con la que espera generar recursos para su sustento diario, aprovechando que se acerca la temporada de fin de año, donde puede vender con mayor facilidad los artículos que elabora, mejorando así la rentabilidad. 

Jorge solo desea sacar adelante su actividad y lograr los objetivos que se propone, pues eso significaría para el, vivir una vejez más tranquila y disfrutar de una mejor calidad de vida en compañía de los seres que ama.
texts.en:
Jorge, age 54, wants to work at making clothes on his own. This idea came out of the need to feel useful and productive. Also, he is experiencing a difficult financial situation. He says that his advanced age does not keep him from doing manual labor. Therefore, he wants to start his own sewing shop.

He is now requesting a loan to buy an overlock sewing machine and supplies wholesale (fabric, thread, trim, and buttons, among others). With this he will be able to put his business idea into operation. By doing so he hopes to generate resources for his daily sustenance. He will be taking advantage of the approaching end of the year season. He will be able to sell the items he makes more easily, improving his profitability in this way.

Jorge only wishes to get ahead with his business activity and to manage to achieve his proposed objectives. To him this will mean living his old age more peacefully and enjoying a better quality of life with his loved ones.

loans.use: to buy an overlock sewing machine and supplies wholesale (fabric, thread, trim, and buttons, among others).

loans.name: Alh. Sabitu

texts.en:
Alhaji Sabitu is a maize farmer and Babban Gona member. Anticipating a good harvest this season, Alhaji Sabitu has the opportunity to attain yields of up to 8 Metric Tonnes of Maize per Hectare of Land, 5.5 times that of the average Nigerian maize farmer. 
Before joining Babban Gona, Alhaji Sabitu would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support Alhaji Sabitu can store his maize and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest. 
As a Babban Gona member, Alhaji Sabitu will benefit from marketing support that could see him generate earnings of up to $2000 per hectare of land. Alhaji Sabitu is thankful that he now has the opportunity to improve the life of his children and family and looks forward to using his additional earnings to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest

loans.name: Jose Rosalino

texts.es: Rosalino tiene 30 años de edad, de estado civil casado, vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos Joel de 16 años y Michael de 6 años edad, el es una persona responsable y muy constante en su trabajo, el se dedica a la crianza y producción de leche, por este motivo es lo que solicita el crédito para comprar una vaca de leche y así poder aumentar su producción de leche y por ende sus ganancias.
texts.en: Rosalino is 30 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and two children, 16 year old Joel and 6 year old Michael. He is a responsible person who is very constant in his job. He works raising cows and producing milk. For this reason he is requesting a loan to buy a dairy milk, and in this way to increase his milk production and with it, his earnings.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Doednath

texts.en:
Doednath thanks all his Kiva lenders for helping him with his house renovation.

He repaid his loan on time, and now wants to buy the furniture for his home and lacks finances. He applied for a loan of SRD 2,000.

loans.use: to buy the furniture for his home

loans.name: Zawadi Self Help Group

texts.en:
The person raising his hand in the photo is Sammy, a member of Zawadi Self Help group which joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in the year 2014 and has benefited from enterprise development and financial management training. He is fifty five years old, married and a father of eight children.

He operates a butchery as his main business and also does farming. He is borrowing from Kiva to add more stock to the butchery and consequently increase his income. This will assist him to cater for the family needs such as food, medicine and in paying school fees for his children.
He is grateful to Kiva and their lenders and promises to pay promptly.

loans.use: to add stock to his butchery, hence more income to cater for his family's basic needs

loans.name: Everlyne

texts.en:
Everlyne is 31 years old married to Sila and blessed with two children aged 9 and 5 years old.

She has been into milk and vegetable selling business for nine years and earns a monthly income of Ksh.5,000.

This being her first loan with VisionFund Kenya,she intends to buy more vegetables and milk for resale in the village.

With anticipated profits, he will be able to help her husband in paying school fees for their children.

Her dream is to start a shop business.

loans.use: to purchase milk and vegetables

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is 49 years old and married with four children. Teresa works very hard to provide for them.

Teresa runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell to her store such as, milk, coffee, drinks, spices, canned goods, noodles, bread, eggs, etc.

Teresa has been in this business for 2 years.

In the future Teresa would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell to her store such as, milk, coffee, drinks, spices, canned goods, noodles, bread, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Jarkynay

texts.ru: Жаркынай успешно погасила свой кредит, она использовала средства по назначению и благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. В хозяйстве Жаркынай на сегодня есть 2 коровы, лошадь, на 5,99 Га земли она выращивает картофель, зерновые культуры и эсарцет для реализации. Экологически чистая и вкусная сельскохозяйственная продукция пользуется большим спросом, принося ежемесячный доход около 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Жаркынай обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для увеличения поголовья. Доходы от кредита она будет вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие бизнеса и ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Jarkynay has successfully repaid her loan. She used the funds as specified and is thankful to Kiva and to everyone who helped her with financing. On Jarkynay's farm today there are two cows, a horse, and on 5.99 hectares of land she cultivates potatoes, grain crops, and sainfoin for sale. Organic and delicious agricultural products enjoy a large demand, bringing a monthly income of about 10,000 som (KGS). 

With the view of further developing her business, Jarkynay has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) in order to buy livestock for increasing her herd. She will invest the funds from the loan in the further development of her business, and renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy some livestock in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Yeimy Luz

texts.es:
Yeimy es una joven de 22 años de edad, el cual inicio un negocio de papelería con la intención de generar recursos para costearse sus estudios puesto que es una mujer humilde pero trabajadora, la cual quiere convertirse en una profesional, conseguir un excelente trabajo o montar empresa y darle una gran vida al ser que más ama en el planeta, su madre.
Pensando en consolidar y posicionar su negocio la joven quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de una fotocopiadora para así agilizar su atención y que los clientes tengan una atención rápida y oportuna y sigan frecuentando su local.
texts.en:
Yaimi is a young 22-year-old who started a started a stationery shop with the goal of earning an income to pay for his studies. She is a very humble woman, but very hard working. She wants to become a professional, find an excellent job or start a businesses, and provide a great life for the person who she loves most on the planet, her mother.

In order to strengthen and position her business, this young woman is requesting a loan to buy a photocopier to speed up her service so that her clients have a quick and timely experience and continue going to her shop.

loans.use: to buy a photocopier to speed up service to clients so that they receive quick and timely experience.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa, a sus 50 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y pujante; pues siempre va en busca de alternativas que le permitan progresar. 
Desde hace 30 años se dedica a trabajar en el campo de la confección, el oficio lo aprendió de manera empírica y poco a poco fue perfeccionando su técnica y ampliando sus conocimientos por medio de la práctica, esto la impulsó para iniciar su propio taller, para lo cual adecuó un espacio en su casa y con unos ahorros que tenía compró sus primeras máquinas. 

Trabaja sola todos los días durante 10 horas, pero en ocasiones recibe el apoyo de una persona, dependiendo de la cantidad de trabajo que tenga; así ha logrado generar los recursos suficientes para solventar los gastos del hogar. 

El crédito que solicita en apoyo con la Corporación Interactuar es para el fortalecimiento de su labor, pues con el dinero comprará insumos para la confección como tela e hilos, con la que podrá agilizar el proceso de producción y adquirir más contratos, generando mayor rentabilidad en el negocio. 

Rosa manifiesta que su mayor desafío es el alto costo de los insumos para trabajar, sin embargo esto la sigue motivando para seguir prestando un mejor servicio y luchar para que el sueño de la acreditación de su negocio se haga realidad y le permita generar oportunidades de empleo, así mejorará su calidad de vida y la de las personas que influyan en la labor.
texts.en:
Rosa, 50, is a hardworking, tenacious woman, always on the lookout for opportunities that will help her succeed. For thirty years she has worked as a seamstress, a trade she learned on her own, gradually improving her technique and developing her skills through practice. This compelled her to open her own shop, dedicating a space in her own home and using some savings to purchase her first machines. She works on her own every day for ten hours, and occasionally has someone come in to help her out, depending on the volume of work. In this way she has been able to generate sufficient income to cover her household expenses.

The loan she is applying for through the Interactuar Corporation will improve her work, since she will use the money to buy sewing supplies such as fabric and thread, letting her streamline her production and win more contracts, and make her business more profitable.

Rosa states that the biggest challenge she faces is the high cost of supplies for her work. Still this motivates her to continue to offer a better service and fight to make her dream of accrediting her business a reality, which will allow her to create jobs, and attain a better standard of living for herself and her employees.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for sewing such as fabric and thread.

loans.name: Luka

texts.en:
Luka is a maize farmer from Rafin Tabo village. As a Babban Gona member, Luka is excited to have access to a trained agronomist and superior inputs that will give him the chance to achieve high yields of up to 8 Metric Tonnes of Maize per Hectare of Land, 5.5 times higher than the average Nigerian farmer. 
Before joining Babban Gona, Luka would have had to sell his maize at harvest, when the price of maize is at it’s lowest, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. As a Babban Gona member Luka can to store the maize he harvests and delay it’s sale until a period later on in the season when he can obtain the best price for his maize at a premium of up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.
Thanks to the support from Babban Gona’s marketing services, Luka no longer feels the pressure to sell his maize at low harvest prices. With the opportunity to earn up to $2000 per Hectare of land, Luka hopes to realize better yields and plans on using his additional income to move into a better home with his family.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest

loans.name: Tehran

texts.en:
Tehran is 22 years old IDP from Bilasuvar region. He is newly married man and has a daughter. He is raising a few cattle and sheep. Usually he raises them for meat purpose but also uses the milk for his family's daily needs. Tehran is very smart, and hard-working man. He knows how to make the calves fat and sell their meats in the local bazaar. The meat is being sold for the clients who needs it for traditional dishes like kebabs, kufta, and others. His meat is raised in a very natural way. That's why people prefer it. He is known as an honest man. Clients trust him and give reference to others about him.

Tehran plans to buy a calf and 4 sheep. He needs 1200 AZN. He hopes that Kiva lenders will support him.

loans.use: to buy a calf and 4 sheep.

loans.name: Iram

texts.en:
Iram is 24 years old, single woman. She is a very talented lady and excels in her work of stitching. She has gotten a lot of appreciation from her community. Some years ago she started her business of tailoring for running her household activities. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

She has now requested for a loan of 40000 PKR to purchase more spools of threads, ribbons, cloth, needles and scissors for sewing more dresses on time, to get a boost in her earnings and wishes to spend it on providing quality life to her family members.

loans.use: to purchase more spools of threads, ribbons, cloth, needles and scissors

loans.name: Mabel Antonia

texts.es: Mabel de 32 años de edad, vive al lado de su compañero de vida y sus hijos de 4 y 13 años de edad. Ella es una madre muy responsable que vela por el bienestar de sus hijos y busca la manera que a ellos no les falte nada, por lo que se dedica a la venta de frutas en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su comunidad. Este negocio lo maneja desde hace aproximadamente 6 años y gracias a ello ya cuenta con un número bastante grande de clientes que la prefieren. Mabel en busca de mejorar su condición de vida solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: arena, cemento y pago de mano de obra para encementar las paredes y el piso del corredor. De esta manera logra mejorar su estilo de vida.
texts.en: Mabel is 32 years old, and lives with her spouse and her children, who are 4 and 13 years old. She is a very responsible mother who looks after the welfare of her children, and tries to prevent them from lacking anything. She works selling fruit in the market that is located close to her community. She has operated this business for about 6 years, and thanks to it she has a large number of customers who choose her. Hoping to improve her living conditions, Mabel is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy sand and cement, and to pay for labor to build the walls and floor of her hallway with cement. In this way she will achieve an improvement to her way of life.

loans.use: to buy sand and cement, and to pay for labor to build the walls and floor of her hallway with cement.

loans.name: Samaila

texts.en:
Samaila is a maize farmer and Babban Gona member. Anticipating a good harvest this season, Samaila has the opportunity to attain yields of up to 8 Metric Tonnes of Maize per Hectare of Land, 5.5 times that of the average Nigerian maize farmer. 
Before joining Babban Gona, Samaila would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support Samaila can store his maize and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest. 
As a Babban Gona member, Samaila will benefit from marketing support that could see him generate earnings of up to $2000 per hectare of land. Samaila is thankful that he now has the opportunity to improve the life of his children and family and looks forward to using his additional earnings to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Yesenia Elizabeth

texts.es: Yesenia es una mujer trabajadora que se dedica a cuidar de un rancho de playa, actividad que realiza desde hace 1 año, por lo que se siente muy feliz de sacar adelante a su familia. Ella tiene 32 años de edad y vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo de 13 años de edad. Yesenia desea construir un cuarto en su vivienda, y para ello solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y hierro para construir un cuarto en su vivienda.
texts.en: Yesenia is a hard-working woman who has worked for 1 year taking care of a beachfront property. She is happy for this work as it allows her to support her family. She is 32 years old and lives with her spouse and her 13-year-old son. Yesenia would like to build a room in her house, and so is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks and iron to build the room.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks and iron to build a room in her house.

loans.name: Marta Iluminidad

texts.es: Marta es una mujer trabajadora de 33 años de edad que vive con su compañero de vida y sus 3 hijos a los que siempre busca la manera de sacar adelante. Ella muestra su tenacidad cada día, prestando sus servicios domésticos, para llevar el sustento a su hogar. Marta desea mejorar su vivienda poco a poco, por lo que solicita a FUSAI un crédito el cual invertirá en: hierro, alambre, polín c, etc., para reparar el techo de su vivienda lo antes posible.
texts.en: Maria is a hard-working 32-year-old woman. She lives with her spouse and her 3 children, and is always trying to find a way to support them. She shows her tenacity every day working as a domestic employee to provide for her household.  Marta would like to improve her house little by little. She is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy iron, wire, beams, etc. to repair the roof of her house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy iron, wire, beams, etc. to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Rania

texts.en:
Rania is a hard-working married mother of two. She is 38, and is working hard to develop her business as much as she can to improve her family's social and financial situations.

Rania used to work in olive oil production and sell pine seeds but through Al Majmoua, she benefited from the free non-financial services programs provided to borrowers and non-borrowers. She decided to learn chocolate production and designs to start her own business.

After graduating from Al Majmoua's vocational training, she has intended to financially support her beloved family. That's why she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to buy necessary chocolate production tools and machines to increase her production.

Rania is working hard to register her own chocolate trademark and distribute her production widely.

loans.use: to buy necessary chocolate production tools and machines to increase her production.

loans.name: Bashiru

texts.en:
Bashiru is a Babban Gona maize farmer. Bashiru is excited that Babban Gona offers a lasting solution to end the cycle of poverty, renewing his dreams of gaining wealth someday.

Traditionally, Bashiru would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. As a member of Babban Gona Bashiru can store his maize at harvest and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest. Benefiting from Babban Gona’s marketing support, Bashiru has the opportunity to generate earnings of up to $2,000 per hectare of land.

Bashiru is thankful that he no longer has to worry about lacking money to repair his house or move into a bigger home and looks forward to using his additional earnings to ensure that all his children get a post-secondary education.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Rebeca Veronica

texts.es: Rebeca de 34 años de edad, vive al lado de su compañero de vida, su hija de 1 año y su hijo de 7 años de edad. Ella es una persona muy tenaz y trabajadora que vela por que a sus hijos no les falte nada y puedan vivir de la mejor manera y para poder lograrlo presta sus servicios domésticos en una vivienda cerca de su comunidad para poder obtener los ingresos económicos necesarios para cubrir los gastos de su familia. Rebeca en busca de poder mejorar su condición de vida solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: ladrillo de piso, arena, cemento y pago de mano de obra para mejorar el piso de la cocina y encementar las paredes.
texts.en: Rebeca is 34 years old and lives with her spouse, her one-year-old daughter and her seven-year-old son. She is a very tenacious and hard-working person who makes sure that her children lack nothing and can live as well as possible. In order to achieve this she works as a domestic employee in a home near her community, to earn the income needed to pay for her family's expenses. Hoping to improve her living conditions, Rebeca is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy floor tiles, sand, and cement, and to pay for labor to improve the floor in the kitchen of her house and to cement the walls.

loans.use: to buy floor tiles, sand, and cement, and to pay for labor to improve the floor in the kitchen of her house and to cement the walls.

loans.name: Mercedes De Maria

texts.es: Mercedes es una mujer que muestra cada día sus deseos de superación, por lo que desde hace 2 años se dedica a la venta de granos básicos, actividad que le permite salir adelante junto a su grupo familiar. Ella tiene  29 años de edad y vive con su grupo familiar desde hace varios años. Mercedes desea invertir en su negocio de venta de granos básicos y para ello solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: frijoles, arroz, maíz, etc., para su venta de granos básicos. Mercedes con el crédito anterior construyo el servicio sanitario de su vivienda, por lo que se siente muy agradecida.
texts.en: Mercedes is a woman who shows her desire to get ahead every day. For 2 years she has worked selling basic grains, which allows her to support her family. She is 29 years old and has lived with her family for several years. Mercedes would like to invest in her business selling basic grains, so she is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy beans, rice, corn, etc. for her business. With her previous loan Mercedes built a wash station in her house, for which she feels very grateful.

loans.use: to buy beans, rice, corn, etc. for her business selling basic grains.

loans.name: Elsa Del Carmen

texts.es: Elsa de 66 años de edad, reside en una humilde vivienda en la cual ha vivido durante 22 años, y para poder cubrir los gastos de su hogar se dedica a la venta de pan y típicos. Este negocio lo ha administrado desde hace 35 años por lo que cuenta con un número de clientes bastante grande. Buscando la manera de poder mejorar su condición de vida, Elsa solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: madera, laminas, clavos y pago de mano de obra para reparar el techo de su vivienda, ya que como se observa en la foto está deteriorado y necesita repararlo lo antes posible para poder estar más tranquila en su hogar.
texts.en: Elsa is 66 years old, and has lived for 22 years in the same modest house. In order to pay her household expenses she sells bread and traditional items. She has operated this business for 35 years, and has a large number of customers. Looking for a way to improve her living conditions, Elsa is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy wood, sheet metal and nails, and to pay for labor to repair the roof of her house. As the photo shows, the roof is deteriorating and she needs to repair it as soon as possible in order to be more relaxed in her home.

loans.use: to buy wood, sheet metal and nails, and to pay for labor to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Allahveren

texts.en:
Allahveren is 29 years old. He is a refugee. He is living in the refugee settlement called Bilasuvar which is in the south part of the country. He resides with his family, like father and mother.

Allahveren has a college education and uses this knowledge in his daily tractor motor parts repair. He has studied technical subjects. To provide a good income for his family, he is involved in the service sector. Allahveren started this servicing business eight years ago and has good experience in it. He has his own tools for repairing in a workshop. Allahveren repairs the motors in the town.

In Bilasuvar many people are involved in farming and frequently there is demand for repairing the broken engine parts of tractors. There is a big demand for this service in Azerbaijan. People require Allahveren's skills. Allahveren has requested a loan in the amount of 1200 AZN to buy new motor parts. He intends to channel his earnings toward developing his business and improving his family's conditions.

loans.use: to buy new tractor motor parts

loans.name: Tukur

texts.en:
Tukur is a maize farmer and Babban Gona member. Anticipating a good harvest this season, Tukur has the opportunity to attain yields of up to 8 metric tonnes of maize per hectare of land, 5.5 times that of the average Nigerian maize farmer.

Before joining Babban Gona, Tukur would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support, Tukur can store his maize and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.

As a Babban Gona member, Tukur will benefit from marketing support that could see him generate earnings of up to $2,000 per hectare of land. Tukur is thankful that he now has the opportunity to improve the life of his children and family and looks forward to using his additional earnings to ensure that all his children get a post-secondary education.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Florence's Group

texts.en:
Florence is a 50-year-old proud mother of eight children. She is a group leader, often described as a very hard-working individual, and is representing her group of 12 farmers in Webuye District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2014, Florence has noticed that she has been able to consistently feed her family.

Florence described her harvest as good last year, but believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. She is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, apart from fertilizer and maize, because she will now be able to have light during dark hours for her children to be able to study. With the profits from this season’s harvest, she plans to send her children to school.

With this loan, Florence’s Group will be able to plant a total of 3 acres of land and purchase a total of eight solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Yusufu

texts.en:
Yusufu is a maize farmer from Kwankwani village. As a Babban Gona member, Yusufu is excited to have access to a trained agronomist and superior inputs that will give him the chance to achieve high yields of up to 8 metric tonnes of maize per hectare of land, 5.5 times higher than the average Nigerian farmer.

Before joining Babban Gona, Yusufu would have had to sell his maize at harvest, when the price of maize is at its lowest, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. As a Babban Gona member, Yusufu can store the maize he harvests and delay its sale until a period later on in the season when he can obtain the best price for his maize at a premium of up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.

Thanks to the support from Babban Gona’s marketing services, Yusufu no longer feels the pressure to sell his maize at low harvest prices. With the opportunity to earn up to $2000 per hectare of land, Yusufu hopes to realize better yields and plans on using his additional income to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest

loans.name: Nafiu

texts.en:
Nafiu is a maize farmer and Babban Gona member. Anticipating a good harvest this season, Nafiu has the opportunity to attain yields of up to 8 metric tonnes of maize per hectare of land, 5.5 times that of the average Nigerian maize farmer.

Before joining Babban Gona, Nafiu would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support Nafiu can store his maize and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.

As a Babban Gona member, Nafiu will benefit from marketing support that could see him generate earnings of up to $2,000 per hectare of land. Nafiu is thankful that he now has the opportunity to improve the life of his children and family and looks forward to using his additional earnings to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest.
